name: Manuka Honey
description: Manuka isn't a raw honey, but it is specialized. It's antibacterial and bacterial resistant. This means that bacteria shouldn't be able to build up a tolerance to its antibacterial effects. Manuka honey is said to be effective for treating everything from a sore throat to clearing up blemishes on your skin.
usageDirections: The main medical use for Manuka honey is for wound and burn healing. It is generally used for treating minor wounds and burns. Research shows Manuka honey to be effective in treating other conditions, including: Skin care including eczema and dermatitis.
